Question 3 
 
The shape of the most commonly deigned highway vertical curve is 
 
(A) Spiral 
 
 
 
(B) Parabolic 
 
(C) Circular (same radius)  
 
(D) Circular (different radius) 
 
B 
Sol. 
The shape of most commonly designed highway vertical curve is parabolic in nature.  
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).

Question 3 
 
The shape of the most commonly deigned highway vertical curve is 
 
(A) Spiral 
 
 
 
(B) Parabolic 
 
(C) Circular (same radius)  
 
(D) Circular (different radius) 
 
B 
Sol. 
The shape of most commonly designed highway vertical curve is parabolic in nature.  
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).

explanation_text:
Sol.
 
We will search for combination of + ve tubes as 5-3-1 in 0.01, 0.001 and 0.0001 ml from the table.
Since, the MPN chart given MPN value of 110 per 100 ml for 10 ml, 1 ml and 0.1 ml dilutions then the
result so obtained is multiplied by
 
10ml

 to obtain MPN per 100 ml for 0.01, 0.001, 0.0001 ml
dilutions 

 MPN per 100 ml = 110 × 1000 = 110000
Hence, the correct option is (C).
